text: Kimberley Driscoll (born August 12, 1966) is an American politician and lawyer. Since 2023, she has been the 73rd lieutenant governor of Massachusetts under Governor Maura Healey. She was also the mayor of Salem from 2006 to 2023. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:People from Salem, Massachusetts Category:American mayors Category:Politicians from Hawaii Category:Lieutenant Governors of Massachusetts Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Kim Driscoll
